input: text: The sun sets in the west. Stars begin to twinkle in the night sky. Owls hoot softly as night embraces the world.
coverage:
```html Formatted Text

The sun sets in the west.

Stars begin to twinkle in the night sky.

Owls hoot softly as night embraces the world.

```
validityText:
The input provides a paragraph of text that appears to meet the minimum requirement of containing at least three sentences: "The sun sets in the west.", "Stars begin to twinkle in the night sky.", and "Owls hoot softly as night embraces the world." The specification also mentions that the paragraph can include words or phrases that can be emphasized using `<strong>` and `<em>` tags, but it does not require them to be present. Therefore, the absence of such tags does not constitute a violation of the specification. The given input text complies with the specification as it is a paragraph with at least three sentences. 

OK
